text: melum, imranin putalviyana maryamaiyum (allah utaranamakkinan) avar tam karpaik kattuk kontar, nam (avaril) nam ruhiliruntu (atmaviliruntu) utinom. Melum, avar tam iraivanin varttaikalaiyum, avanutaiya vetankalaiyum meyppittar - (erruk kontar); innum, avar (allahvai vananki) valipattavarkalil oruvarakavum iruntar
